title: How to test Jakarta Faces with HTMLUnit and Arquillian
content: In this article we will walk through the HTMLUnit library to learn how to test Web applications. You can combine HTMLUnit with Arquillian to test Jakarta Faces applications with ease. What is HTML Unit? HTMLUnit is a Java-based testing tool that allows developers to automate testing of web applications. It simulates a web browser, allowing ...  The post appeared first on .
